languages.text:
"Нож под луною сверкнул, расчертил волчью морду порезом,
В миг отступил темный морок, рассеялись чары".

"The knife in the moonlight gleamed,
across the wolf's face cutting,
In a blink,
the dark gloom receded,
the spell dissipated."
languages.original_text:
"Нож под луною сверкнул, расчертил волчью морду порезом,
В миг отступил темный морок, рассеялись чары".

languages.text:
「月明かりに照らされた短剣が輝き
狼の顔を切り裂いた
瞬く間に
暗闇は消え去り
呪いは解かれた」
languages.original_text:
"The knife in the moonlight gleamed,
across the wolf's face cutting,
In a blink,
the dark gloom receded,
the spell dissipated."

traits.locale_text:
「月明かりに照らされた短剣が輝き
狼の顔を切り裂いた
瞬く間に
暗闇は消え去り
呪いは解かれた」

languages.text:
“刀刃在月光下隐约闪烁，
划过狼的面孔，
眨眼之间，
黑暗退去，
诅咒消散。”
languages.original_text:
"The knife in the moonlight gleamed,
across the wolf's face cutting,
In a blink,
the dark gloom receded,
the spell dissipated."

traits.locale_text:
“刀刃在月光下隐约闪烁，
划过狼的面孔，
眨眼之间，
黑暗退去，
诅咒消散。”

languages.text:
« Le couteau étincela au clair de lune
et balafra le visage du loup.
En un éclair,
le sort se dissipa
et les noires humeurs s'estompèrent. »
languages.original_text:
"The knife in the moonlight gleamed,
across the wolf's face cutting,
In a blink,
the dark gloom receded,
the spell dissipated."

et les noires humeurs s'estompèrent. »

languages.text:
«La cuchilla destelló bajo la luna,
seccionando el hocico del lobo.
En un suspiro,
retrocedió la siniestra penumbra,
y el hechizo se disipó con premura».
languages.original_text:
"The knife in the moonlight gleamed,
across the wolf's face cutting,
In a blink,
the dark gloom receded,
the spell dissipated."

languages.text:
"Das Messer im Mondschein glänzte,
dem Wolf das Gesicht aufschlitzend,
und in einem Wimpernschlag
zog die dunkle Düsternis sich zurück,
der Zauber war verflogen."
languages.original_text:
"The knife in the moonlight gleamed,
across the wolf's face cutting,
In a blink,
the dark gloom receded,
the spell dissipated."

languages.text:
"Bıçak ay ışığında parladı,
Kurdun yüzünde bir çizgi açtı.
Göz açıp kapayana dek
Geri çekildi kara kasvet,
Büyü çözülüverdi."
languages.original_text:
"The knife in the moonlight gleamed,
across the wolf's face cutting,
In a blink,
the dark gloom receded,
the spell dissipated."

traits.locale_text:
"Bıçak ay ışığında parladı,
kurdun yüzünde bir çizgi oldu.
Göz açıp kapayana dek,
kara kasvet geri çekildi,
büyü çözülüverdi."
